thread.title_full: Video: News Wrap: States sue to block carbon emission curbs | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: News Wrap: States sue to block carbon emission curbs PBS NewsHour
text: In our news wrap Friday, two dozen states went to federal court to block EPA curbs on carbon dioxide emissions. States such as West Virginia, Texas and Florida say the plan is illegal and will devastate their economies. Also, Lincoln Chafee, former Rhode Island senator and governor, dropped out of the contest for the Democratic presidential nomination.
